original_text: On the first day of the Festival of Unleavened Bread, when it was customary to sacrifice the Passover lamb, Jesus’ disciples asked him, “Where do you want us to go and make preparations for you to eat the Passover?”
korean_text: 무교절의 첫날 곧 유월절 양 잡는 날에 제자들이 예수께 여짜오되 우리가 어디로 가서 선생님께서 유월절 음식을 잡수시게 준비하기를 원하시나이까 하매

sentences.original_text: On the first day of the Festival of Unleavened Bread
when it was customary to sacrifice the Passover lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 유월절 양을 잡는 관습이 있을 때에

sentences.original_text: Where do you want us to go

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신을 위해 준비하게 하기를 원하십니까
